original_title: Tess Has a Stain on Her Dress
overview: The red stain on Tess's dress arouses from her family a series of odd and surprising reactions. Everything looks puzzling and unfamiliar until she comes across another boy who sees the stain for what it really is.

production_companies.name: Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design

title: Tess Has a Stain on Her Dress
